snippet: President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia piloted a motorized hang glider over an Arctic wilderness area while guiding a flock of migratory birds toward their winter habitat as part of an operation called “The Flight of Hope.”
abstract: President Vladimir V Putin of Russia pilots a motorized hang glider over an Arctic wilderness area while guiding a flock of migratory birds toward their winter habitat; it is not the first time he has tried to burnish his public image as a caring outdoorsman, or macho man of adventure.
lead_paragraph: President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia piloted a motorized hang glider over an Arctic wilderness area while guiding a flock of migratory birds toward their winter habitat as part of an operation called “The Flight of Hope.”

headline.seo: Putin Pulls Off His Latest Feat: Flying With Migratory Birds
headline.main: Putin Pulls Off Latest Feat: Flying With the Birds
headline.print_headline: Putin Pulls Off Latest Feat: Flying With the Birds
